37329.summary: Some customers in Gonor and surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37329.title: May 13 – Gonor and Surrounding Areas | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
